snippet: The private equity firm co-founded by the U.S. presidential candidate Mitt Romney has agreed to buy the call center unit of the European telecoms giant Telefónica for $1.3 billion.
abstract: The private equity firm co-founded by the U.S. presidential candidate Mitt Romney has agreed to buy the call center unit of the European telecoms giant Telefónica for $1.3 billion.

headline.main: Bain Capital to Buy Call Center Business for $1.3 Billion
